# <a name="add-a-holiday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="2623f-102">Pridať kalendár dovolenky v Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2623f-102">Add a holiday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2623f-103">V dolnej časti stránky vyberte ikonu kalendára</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2623f-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="2623f-104">[prejdete na kalendár](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2623f-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2623f-105">Na ľavej table vyberte položku **Pridať kalendár** > **zaujímavé kalendáre** > **sviatky**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2623f-105">In the left pane, select **Add calendar** > **Interesting Calendars** > **Holidays**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2623f-106">Vyberte kalendár dovolenky, ktorý chcete, a potom vyberte **X** v hornom rohu, aby ste uložili svoj výber a zatvorili okno **Pridať kalendár** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2623f-106">Select the holiday calendar you want and then select **X** in the top corner to save your choice and close the **Add calendar** window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2623f-107">Prečítajte si ďalšie informácie o [pridávaní alebo odstraňovaní kalendárov narodenín a dovolenky](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2623f-107">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
